description:
This course is setup for the developer that wants a quick course that covers the care basics of Docker functionality, architecture, and how to start using Docker ASAP! It's geared toward any level developer, from beginner to experienced, with an assumption that the developer is moderately familiar with the command line.

In the course the student will learn the core fundamentals and primary architecture of Docker & related tools that make Docker one of the top tools for streamlining a developers' workflow today. This course will teach you what you need to know to get Docker installed, running, and spool up additional Docker containers to help with your development. In addition I cover material on creating your own custom Docker images to use as containers. With this material you'll be able to create what you need for your own development and get involved with the general Docker and development community.
title: Docker Ecosystem Introduction
